statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ -6 \\ -14 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 15 \\ 25 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -5 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
